overview:
Staff User Experience Manager, Google Jan 2007 - Present

UX thought leader at Google. Previously led and managed design teams responsible for application design, including end-to-end experiences for products such as Gmail, Google Calendar, Google Reader, and the Google Docs suite. I continue to lead design teams and effect UX strategy for special projects at Google.

Head of Design, Google TV May 2009 - Nov 2011

Responsible for rebooting the Google TV design strategy from the ground up, launching version 2.0. Design visionary and manager responsible for leading the creative direction of the Google TV platform. Led and managed the design team responsible for launching the core product interfaces and partner design strategy. Performed role of Google TV’s executive creative director with partners such as Sony, Logitech, Vizio, LG, and other top tier consumer electronics manufacturers for the launch of their various product lines.

Principal, User Experience, GE Healthcare Jan 2001 - Mar 2003

I served as design leader at GE Healthcare Solutions where I was the design and user experience principal for the business. During my tenure at GE, I planned, directed, and established all user interface, user experience, and usability initiatives for GE Medical Systems. During the ‘Imagination at Work’ re-brand, my contributions were instrumental in establishing the new brand identity in print, web, and software for the medical systems division.

Senior UI Architect, Intraware Jan 1999 - Jan 2001

Intraware provided integrated, web-enabled services that helped the purchase, delivery, and maintenance of enterprise software. As Senior UI Architect, I lead the interaction design, information architecture, and user interface design of their web site and services. I joined Intraware in it’s pre-IPO infancy and helped scale the design offerings to support our tremendous growth once the company went public.

Founder, OccupyBaby OccupyBaby is an iPhone and iPod app designed to calm, entertain, and educate toddlers. Whether parents are in the car, on a flight, or at the supermarket, the interactive landscapes, music, and sound effects capture the attention and imagination of thier kids. I was responsible for the product conception, identity, design, marketing, and execution. I currently maintain the app as a hobby. Design Consultancy AOL, Netscape Communications, Sony Electronics. See portfolio for details.

Recognition 2010 Google OC Award Recognized and awarded a Google Operating Committee award for outstanding innovations at Google.

2007 Google Founder’s Award Recognized and awarded the Google Founder’s Award by Larry Page and Sergey Brin for outstanding contribution to Google.

Industry Speaker, Thought Leader IPTV World Forum, 2011

Patents | 2008-2011 Internet Television Search, Universal Search on TV

AIGA National Associate and Speaker American Institue of Graphic Arts

SIGCHI Associate and Speaker User Experience and Human Factors Society

Technology Innovation of the Year | 2003 Award in Healthcare Technology presented by Frost & Sullivan

Codie Award Winner | 2001, 2002 Best Web Services and Deployment Application
